query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS automation_runs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  raceId VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL,
  raceName VARCHAR(256),
  trackName VARCHAR(100),
  raceTime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  predictions TEXT,
  topPick VARCHAR(256),
  topPickScore INT,
  exoticPicks TEXT,
  ensembleScore INT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS race_results_log (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  raceId VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  raceName VARCHAR(256),
  raceTime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  winner VARCHAR(256),
  placings TEXT,
  winningOdds INT,
  resultStatus VARCHAR(50),
  resultFetchedAt TIMESTAMP,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS automation_stats (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  totalRacesDetected INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalPredictionsGenerated INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalResultsFetched INT DEFAULT 0,
  topPickAccuracy INT DEFAULT 0,
  topPickPlaceAccuracy INT DEFAULT 0,
  exactaHitRate INT DEFAULT 0,
  trifectaHitRate INT DEFAULT 0,
  superfectaHitRate INT DEFAULT 0,
  avgConfidenceScore INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalProfit INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalROI INT DEFAULT 0,
  lastRaceProcessedAt TIMESTAMP,
  lastErrorAt TIMESTAMP,
  lastErrorMessage TEXT,
  isAutomationEnabled INT DEFAULT 1,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS race_results_log (

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS automation_stats (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,

  totalRacesDetected INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalPredictionsGenerated INT DEFAULT 0,
  totalResultsFetched INT DEFAULT 0,
  topPickAccuracy INT DEFAULT 0,
  topPickPlaceAccuracy INT DEFAULT 0,
  exactaHitRate INT DEFAULT 0,
  trifectaHitRate INT DEFAULT 0,
